definition: silt/river sludge/to silt up/choked with silt/variant of 瘀[yu1]
"water" radical in Chinese characters (Kangxi radical 85), occurring in 没, 法, 流 etc/see also 三點水|三点水[san1 dian3 shui3]
lit. to grow out of the mud unsullied (idiom)/fig. to be principled and incorruptible
pinyin: chu1 yu1 ni2 er2 bu4 ran3

definition: silted up/obstructed by silt/variant of 瘀滯|瘀滞[yu1 zhi4]

sentences.english: For the past 30 years or more, great changes of scouring and deposition have taken place at the Zhenyang Reach in the Changjiang River.
sentences.chinese: 三十多年来，长江镇扬河段发生了巨大的冲淤变化。

sentences.english: Gulf reclamation project has an impact on the trends and siltation .
sentences.chinese: 海湾内的围垦工程对潮流及冲淤都将产生影响。

sentences.english: One of the main reasons for the longitudinal deformation of river-crossing tunnels is riverbed scouring and siltation.
sentences.chinese: 河床冲淤是引起过江隧道纵向变形的一个主要原因。

sentences.english: The main mechanisms of hyporheic exchange include pumping exchange and turnover exchange.
sentences.chinese: 潜流交换机理主要包括泵吸交换和冲淤交换。

sentences.english: Only a heavy blow to the head could have left such abruised and swollen face.
sentences.chinese: 她脸上的淤紫和肿胀，只能是头部受到重击造成的。

sentences.english: The channel is almost choked with silt.
The clogging of relief-wells of Jing Jiang Dyke and its rehabilitation and preventions are discussed.
sentences.chinese: 本文讨论了荆江大堤减压井的淤堵，修复及预防。

sentences.english: The effect of dredging channel for deposition reduction is related to dredged channel geometry morphology and dredged channel area.
sentences.chinese: 挖河减淤效果与挖槽几何形态及挖槽面积有关。

sentences.english: The test target of "depositing coarse sand and discharging the fine" is basically achieved.
sentences.chinese: 放淤试验工程“淤粗排细”的目标基本得以实现。

definition: hematoma (internal blood clot)/extravasated blood (spilt into surrounding tissue)/contusion
clotted blood/extravasated blood (leaking into surrounding tissue)/thrombosis
to obstruct/to stop up/to heap soil around the roots of a plant
(in Chinese medicine) stasis (of blood or other fluids)
